pages.text: Your new magic fishing rods have the interesting property of attracting even living creatures. Why that wasn't a thing with your boring rods? I don't know.\With this enchantment, you can further increase the chance of catching living creatures.

pages.title: Characteristics
pages.text: Increases the chance to reel in living creatures when fishing.\\Max Level: 3\Applicable to Spectrum's Fishing Rods.

pages.title: Enchanter Recipe
pages.text: You can infuse a [#](bb00bb)common Book[#]() with Big Catch by surrounding your [Enchanter](entry://enchanting/enchanter) with [Pigment](entry://general/pigment) and the other required materials.

pages.title: Enchantment Upgrading
pages.text: Upgrading Big Catch from level 1 to level 2 is fairly cheap at first.\This price will quickly increase to more and more [Pigment](entry://general/pigment)$() and experience for each additional level.
